name: Pixel Pulse
description:
This little rhythm game was created in 2 weeks as a prototype and as an opportunity to learn PICO-8. Inspired by games like Geometry Dash and Just Shapes & Beats, this game incorporates platformer and bullethell elements into its gameplay. Currently there is only one song implemented, but is still quite the challenge to beat.

Music & Level Design by Nathan Dalessio
Programming & Art by Maxen McCoy
